The story is fine until Dramus ruined her story with the prologues showing how the Fuckboy conquers her. Instead of developing the FMC, it makes her look stupider. Dramus practically shows that the relationship between the Fuckboy and Akina is nothing more than a form of escapism on her part (Akina). Therefore, it´s somewhat stupid to me that things will end with Akina being <victorious> when the real consequence will be that such a relationship will fails. For this reason, history seems very biased to me.

It counts as NTR even tho they were never dating? Not really a cuck. Someone just bought the bread before you. It's fair game. Nobody stole anything from you or made ur gf cheat if she was gf. U can't tie someone down like that. I know it sucks and I've been in this guy's position before. I had it done by someone who knew me and knew how i felt about the person and did it because of that. But, years later, in retrospect, it was fair game. (the analogy i use now is that they pushed me to knock me down but in the greater scheme, they pushed me out of the way of a train and got hit by that train instead.) It was a dirty move because they did it just to knock me down a notch but its fair game. I can jokingly say i was ntr'ed but not really. That hoe was never mine. She belonged to the streets.

here if you look at the every doujin artist's tweet, you will always find discussions between followers (mostly the Japanese) starting from appreciation & questions about the continuation of the project.

Well I dont mind ntr's but what really completes a story to reel in a lot of people.. is revenge. It's sad to see only a few implemented this idea into their works and most who have, are the ones with successful views on their doujins. Let's see more development from a dumb cuck but only if the author is giving a certain plot to feel and that's definitely being cucked like how all you vanilla-lovers are feeling reading ntr. CUCKED.
